text: These K-Cups from San Francisco Bay Coffee have great flavor and they are certainly competively priced, but they do not fit properly in my Keurig Coffee Maker.  It is an effort to close the top of the coffee maker to a point where the water begins to filter through the cup.  I noticed this when I first bought them, but thought it was just a fluke.  Subsequent shipments were the same.  I don't think I will purchase this product again.
